title: McLaren to auction future F1, Le Mans and Indy 500 cars
summary: McLaren will make motor sport history by auctioning three future competition cars - including a yet-to-be-raced Formula 1 chassis - before they even hit the track

qa_pairs.question: What is significant about McLaren's decision to auction future competition cars?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is the first time a team will auction cars that have not yet raced.
wrong_options: It allows fans to own a piece of racing history.
It is part of a financial strategy to fund the team.
It showcases the latest technology in motor racing.

qa_pairs.question: Which types of racing events are included in McLaren's auction?
What does the auction of a yet-to-be-raced Formula 1 chassis indicate about McLaren's approach to motorsport?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It highlights their innovative marketing strategy and engagement with fans.
wrong_options: It shows they are struggling financially.
It means they are discontinuing their F1 program.
It indicates they have no confidence in their current car.
